SELECT USER_EMAIL, '****' AS USER_PW, USER_NM, MOBILE, MENU_CTR, MENU_CTR_NM, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_LOGIN, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LAST_LOGIN, PW_FAIL, DATE_FORMAT(CR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CR_DT, GET_USER_NM('M',CR_ID) AS CR_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UP_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UP_DT, GET_USER_NM('M',UP_ID) AS UP_ID FROM CH_MEMBER WHERE 1=1
AND USER_EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{SRCH_EMAIL} ,'%')
AND USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{SRCH_USERNM} , '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE CH_MEMBER SET USER_PW = CASE WHEN #{USER_PW} != '****' THEN #{USER_PW} ELSE USER_PW END, USER_NM = #{USER_NM}, MOBILE = #{MOBILE}, MENU_CTR = #{MENU_CTR}, MENU_CTR_NM = #{MENU_CTR_NM}, PW_FAIL = #{PW_FAIL}, UP_DT = NOW(), UP_ID = #{SESS_EMAIL} WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{USER_EMAIL}
